description:
Like Youko, Shoryuu is a taika. He has ruled En for approximately five hundred years and is considered a genius of administration. However, Shoryuu believes that all kings have the potential to be great and that he is by no means exceptional as a human being.
Shouryuu is currently the King of En (En-Ou in the anime, though in TokyoPop`s english translation of the novels he is called the Ever-King). When he travels incognito, he goes by the name of Fuukan. His Japanese name is Komatsu Naotaka.
name: Shouryuu
